thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 30 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Ningbo GQY Video and Telecom Joint-stock sees FY 2017 net loss to be 97 mln yuan to 117 mln yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ningbo GQY Video and Telecom Joint-stock sees FY 2017 net loss to be 97 mln yuan to 117 mln yuan

organizations.name: ningbo gqy video & telecom joint-stock co ltd

text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Ningbo GQY Video & Telecom Joint-stock Co Ltd :
* Sees FY 2017 net loss to be 97 million yuan to 117 million yuan
* Says the net loss of FY 2016 was 21.7 million yuan
* Says that decrease in operation revenue as main reason for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/2yDjTT
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
